mapper.select:
select t1.id ,t1.name,t1.phone,t1.id_no,t2.create_time apply_time,t2.status,if(t2.status='2','授信通过','授信不通过') status_name,t2.credit_time,t3.final_amount amount from cus_user_info t1 inner join (select a.cus_user_id,a.status,a.create_time,a.credit_time from credit_apply a left join credit_apply b on a.cus_user_id = b.cus_user_id and a.credit_time > b.credit_time where a.status in (2,3) group by a.cus_user_id) t2 on t1.id = t2.cus_user_id inner join credit_info t3 on t1.id = t3.cus_user_id where t3.status = 1
and t2.status = #{status}
and t1.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name}), '%')
order by t2.credit_time
mapper.update: update credit_info set status=2 where cus_user_id = #{cusUserId}
